description: A large rectangular piece of fabric with distinctive design and colors, typically used as a symbol or for decoration.
//: Descriptions below should ONLY describe the visual appearance of flags themselves rather than the ideas behind them and shouldn't be taken as assuming support for any concepts that they represent.  Flags that are not actually 'pride' flags exist as variants here in order to keep things simple.

variants.description: This one is horizontally striped, with six equally sized stripes: red, orange, yellow, green blue and violet, from top to bottom.

This one is horizontally striped, with six equally sized stripes: red, orange, yellow, green blue and violet, from top to bottom, with a chevron along the hoist that consists of white, pink, light blue, brown and black stripes, from left to right.
This one is horizontally striped, with seven equally sized stripes: black, gray, white, green, white, gray, and black, in that order from both top and bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with deep pink stripe at the top, a narrow purple stripe in the middle, and a blue stripe at the bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with three equally sized stripes: magenta, yellow and cyan, from top to bottom.
This one consists of a white labrys, a type of double-bitted battle axe, superimposed on the black triangle, against a violet hue background color.
This one is horizontally striped, with seven equally sized stripes: dark rose, dusty pink, pink, white, light orange, orange, and dark orange, from top to bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with four equally sized stripes: black, gray, white and purple, from top to bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with five equally sized stripes: green, light green, white, gray and black, from top to bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with five equally sized stripes: blue, pink, white, pink and blue, in that order from both top and bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with three equally sized stripes: lavender, white and green, from top to bottom.
This one is displaying an open purple circle lying on a yellow field.
This one is horizontally striped, with six equally sized stripes: pink, white, purple, black and blue, from top to bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with four equally sized stripes: yellow, white, purple and black, from top to bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with three equally sized stripes: pink, green and blue, from top to bottom.

This one is horizontally striped, with nine equally sized stripes, from top to bottom: four of alternating black and royal blue, one white, and four of alternating royal blue and black, with a tilted red heart in the canton.
This one is horizontally striped, with seven equally sized stripes: dark brown, orange, golden yellow, tan, white, gray, and black, with a black bear paw print in the canton.
This one is displaying a white Venus symbol merged with a raised fist lying on a purple field.
This one is horizontally striped, with six alternating stripes of black and white.
This one is colored black, and displays the words: ''BLACK LIVES MATTER''.
This one is colored white.
This one is colored black.
This one is colored red.
This one is colored green.
This one is colored blue.
This one is colored yellow.
This one is displaying a cat face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a dog face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a fox face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a dragon face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a rabbit face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a mouse face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a wolf face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a pig face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a crab lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a crab lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a tiger face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a monkey face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a horse face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a bear face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a panda face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a beer mug lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a yellow smiling face lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a yellow radiation symbol lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a yellow biohazard symbol lying on a black field.
This one is displaying a black peace symbol lying on a white field.
This one is diagonally split into two triangles, with one colored red and the other one colored black.
This one is diagonally split into two triangles, with one colored yellow and the other one colored black.
This one is diagonally split into two triangles, with one colored green and the other one colored black.
This one is diagonally split into two triangles, with one colored white and the other one colored black.
This one is diagonally split into two triangles, with one colored blue and the other one colored black.
This one is displaying two diagonal blue bars with small white stars on each and with a white outline, lying on a red field.
This one displays white human skull and crossbones lying on a black field.
This one displays a timber rattlesnake coiled and ready to strike on a yellow field.  Beneath the rattlesnake are the words: ''DONT TREAD ON ME''.
This one displays interlaced rings, colored, from left to right, blue, yellow, black, green and red, lying on a white field.
This one displays NASA logo lying on a white field.
This one is horizontally striped, with two equally sized stripes: blue and yellow, from top to bottom.
This one is horizontally striped, with three equally sized stripes: white, blue and red, from top to bottom.
This one consists of a vertical triband of red (hoist-side and fly-side) and white (double width) with the red maple leaf centred on the white band.
This one consists of a vertical tricolor of green, white and red, from left to right, with the golden eagle perched on a prickly pear cactus devouring a rattlesnake centered on the white band.
This one consists of a white-fimbriated symmetric red cross on a blue field with a white-fimbriated counterchanged saltire of red and white.
This one consists of a Blue Ensign defaced with the Commonwealth Star in the lower hoist quarter and the five stars of the Southern Cross in the fly half.
This one is horizontally striped, with three equally sized horizontal stripes: black, red and gold, from top to bottom.
This one consists of equally sized horizontal bands of white and red, from top to bottom.
This one displays a red disc centered on a white rectangular banner.
This one displays a blue Star of David between two horizontal blue stripes on a white field.
This one displays a large golden star within an arc of four smaller golden stars, in the canton, on a field of Chinese red.
This one displays a red field with a navy blue canton bearing a white sun with twelve triangular rays.

This one displays a wide red stripe at the centre, bordered by a narrow white stripe both above and below, followed by a blue stripe.  The central red stripe carries a five-pointed red star within a white circle near the hoist.
This one displays a white field with a centered red and blue taegeuk surrounded by four trigrams.
This one is horizontally striped, with three equally sized stripes: saffron, white and green, from top to bottom, and with a navy blue wheen with twenty-four spokes in the centre.
This one displays a black Nordic cross with a white-blue-white outline, with a white circle with a rubric for KEK within it, and a white 4chan logo in the canton, lying on a green field.
This one displays a circle of twelve five-pointed yellow stars on a blue field.
This one displays a golden hammer and sickle and a gold-bordered red star in its upper canton on a red field.
This one displays a white disc with a black swastika symbol within it lying on a red field.
This one is vertically striped, with three equally sized stripes: red, white and red, from left to right, with a Blood Drop Cross symbol in the center.
This one displays white Arabic text emblazoned across the black field in calligraphy style writing.
It's colored yellow, commonly used by general, unspecialized workers like laborers and operators of heavy machinery.
It's colored orange, commonly used by road construction workers, new hires, and site visitors.
It's colored white, commonly used by anyone in a supervisory position, including managers, architects, engineers, and foremen.
It's colored brown, commonly used by workers using applications involving high heat such as welders.
It's colored blue, commonly used by medical workers and electricians, as well as employees in a technical advisory role.
It's colored green, commonly used by safety officers and inspectors.
It's colored red, commonly used by emergency workers and firefighters.
It's colored pink, commonly issued as a punishment to workers that forgot or lost their hard hat.  Or maybe the previous owner just liked pink.
It's colored grey, commonly used by visitors to any worksite.
It's colored black, like the first real hard hats in history.
It has cartoon character stickers all over it.

It's decorated with an American flag pattern.

description: A large American flag, made to fly in even the worst conditions.
